Topic.Title: * _ GOOG MADE $43 BILLION LAST 4 QUARTERS. ANY LAWSUIT LOSS PAYOUTS WOULD BE AN INSIGNIFICANT "DROP IN BUCKET" _

Message.Msg: Mosquitoes are small too, a common insect found throughout the world. Most people consider them pests like VRNG is to GOOG, but they are a vector agent for some of the world's most deadly diseases. The mosquito is a small flying insect with a forward facing needle-like projection called a proboscis. The proboscis is used to suck the blood from warm blood vertibrates, including GOOG. They are carries of many diseases, including West Nile virus, yellow feaver, and encephalitis. Some also carry the parasite responsible for malaria. Every year 300 million people across Africa, South America, and Asia are infected with malaria. The malaria parasite destroys blood cell and clogs the flow of blood. Google will take be sucked dry. Time to short GOOG and buy VRNG.

Message.Title: google under investigation
Message.Msg: The F.T.C. is not the only agency that has raised concerns about Google’s stewardship of standard-essential patents. The Justice Department, when it approved Google’s acquisition of Motorola and the consortium’s purchase of Nortel’s patents earlier this year, issued a statement praising the “clear commitments” by Apple and Microsoft to license standard patents on fair terms. It also noted their pledge not to try to use such patents to seek court injunctions to stop shipments of rivals’ products. “Google’s commitments,” the Justice Department statement said, “were more ambiguous and do not provide the same direct confirmation of its standard-essential patent licensing policies.”

Message.Title: GOOG WILL GO WILD SOON, AGAIN!!
Message.Msg: I think there is a very good reason: the float is only 400M and 80% is held by institutional investors. Because of such low actual float, GOOG should split 2 for 1, which balances the float and provides enough liquidity to trade. I think big boys know that a split is coming and hence they are loading at any price, because the another 400 MIL float will get absorbed quickly. Settlement or no settlement with VRNG, GOOG is set to split and go wild. It has finally hit the gas and it won't stop until it hits $1,000 or $500 with split.
